job_description:
• Strong background in computer vision, ML, and Python/C++ development.
• Proven experience leading large-scale engineering or device projects.
• Hands-on IIoT and system design experience.
• Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.
• Lead end-to-end engineering projects integrating computer vision, ML, and IIoT.
• Design and implement real-time vision systems and hardware solutions.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop models, simulations, and prototypes.
• Manage multiple initiatives and drive engineering excellence through documentation and standards.
